Text: Red Herring needs your helpHerring values the opinions of our customers Therefore we would really appreciate your help in determining our new tagline Our current tagline The Business of Technology is felt to be somewhat limiting now that the business of technology has assumed great importance across all areas of business Therefore please click on the survey link scriptsqcwebdllstarthtmlorionrhcsuz and let us know your opinion The survey should only take a few minutes of your time and would be incredibly valuable to us Thanks in advance for your support and participation Sincerely Red Herring Communications wwwredherringcom
